metadata.title: Wednesday, 14th June, 2023
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct an oil pipeline between Namibia and Zambia; and
(b) if so, when construction works will commence.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to rehabilitate the following roads in Chimbamilonga Parliamentary Constituency:
(i) Roma – Kakoma – Mupandi – Kabompo; (ii)     Kananda – Katele; (iii) Kampinda Turn-Off – Kashikishi; (iv) Tupele – Mikose;
(v) Mwewe – Munwa – Cholwe; (vi) Chilemba – Kapisha; and (vii) Katwatwa – Banda;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what the estimated cost of the project is;
(d) what the estimated time frame for the completion of the project is;  and
(e) if there are no such plans, why.
